name: Heróis e Vampiros
summary: Heróis e Vampiros was a multiplayer Trading Card Game designed to complement the release of the vampire-themed telenovela O Beijo do Vampiro. In this card game, players could discover hints from the TV show to obtain special cards and abilities. Conversely, specific in-game events also impacted the storyline of the TV series, mirroring the dynamic struggle between Good and Evil portrayed both on screen and within the gaming world.
